name: Ultrix (CCI)
overview: One of two games on the C64 called Ultrix. This game is a shoot 'em up that was developed by Jonathan Living and published by Commodore Computing International (CCI) in 1988. Jonathan Living again! This time with a Space invaders style arcade game but with the addition of a few cryptic comments. The rules are simple and yet the game is difficult enough for it to be a challenge.
